tool_description: Analyzes text sentiment using multiple approaches to determine overall customer satisfaction levels with confidence scores.

model_type.description: Sentiment model to use: basic, advanced, or ensemble

include_neutral.description: Whether to include neutral sentiment category

error_messages: Empty text: Provide non-empty text for sentiment analysis.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Text too short: Provide at least 3 words for meaningful sentiment analysis.
usage: Input preprocessed customer text and configure model type and confidence settings. Returns sentiment classification with confidence scores and polarity strength.

confidence_score.description: Confidence level of the sentiment prediction (0.0-1.0)

subjectivity_score.description: Subjectivity level (0.0-1.0, where 1.0 is highly subjective)
